title: Test Validation System
description: As a developer, I want to validate system functionality through automated testing so that I can ensure code reliability and catch issues early.
iWant: to validate system functionality through automated testing
soThat: I can ensure code reliability and catch issues early
acceptanceCriteria: Given test cases are written, when tests execute, then results are clearly reported
Given code changes are made, when tests run, then failures are immediately identified
Given test completion, when results are reviewed, then pass/fail status is unambiguous
